channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- UAA Release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- UAA Release

item.title: CVE-2018-11082|2024-09-17T02:00:59.932Z -- cloud%20foundry -- uaa%20release
item.description: Cloud Foundry UAA, all versions prior to 4.20.0 and Cloud Foundry UAA Release, all versions prior to 61.0, allows brute forcing of MFA codes. A remote unauthenticated malicious user in possession of a valid username and password can brute force MFA to login as the targeted user.
